text: is it unprofessional to use references to the ASCII in a code (since it's not very readable)?
There's always alternatives to ASCII in established languages like Java, Python etc.
you can use ASCII codes if absolutely necessary, but in practice, there are always plenty of alternatives

I almost forgot to answer this question in my txt file and thought it might help to remind others too (JUST in case) - "What is the relationship between this number and the size of the list?” :slightly_smiling_face:
